user_question: Can you provide a vegan recipe for a traditional dish from Japan and generate an image of it?
final_answer: Vegan sushi recipe: 2 cups sushi rice, 3 cups water, 1/4 cup rice vinegar, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp salt, nori sheets, avocado, cucumber, carrots, and tofu. Image of vegan sushi generated. To prepare tofu, press to remove water, marinate in soy sauce and sesame oil, then pan-fry until golden.
